meanings.sent1: The sun sets in the westmost part of the sky.
meanings.sent2: California is known for its beautiful westmost beaches.
meanings.sent3: I always feel like the westmost slice of pizza is the tastiest.
meanings.sent4: The westmost edge of the map marked the end of their journey.
meanings.sent5: The westmost horizon glowed with the colors of the setting sun.

meanings.sent1: The westmost building in the town is a tall lighthouse.
meanings.sent2: The westmost point of the country is a popular tourist destination.
meanings.sent3: The westmost tree in the forest always seems to catch the most sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams always led her to the westmost corners of the world.
meanings.sent5: The westmost star in the sky shone brightly against the dark night.
